function.name: deviceState_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set a specific value on a SmartThings device, excluding volume or temperature adjustments.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the specific value.

number.description: The specific value to set on the device.

predefinedUnit.description: The predefined unit for the specific value to set on the device.
